New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest century in an ICC Men's Cricket World Cup with a 40-ball 106
Key Match Events: Maxwell and Pat Cummins' 103-run partnership in 17 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Maxwell had been struggling with form before the match but focused due to illness
Post-Match Reflections: Maxwell's comments on his performance and the impact of his family's presence
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia's win by 309 runs, Netherlands' low total of 90
